faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Real Estate Agents in Sector 90
faqSection.description: Get clear, concise answers to your most pressing questions regarding property acquisition, sales processes, and the role of real estate agents in Sector 90 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the standard commission structure for real estate agents in Sector 90 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The commission structure typically adheres to prevailing market standards in Gurugram, usually ranging between 1 to 2 percent of the total transaction value for sales. For rentals, it often equals one month's rent shared between the parties. Our affiliated agents ensure the fee structure is explicitly detailed in writing before any engagement, guaranteeing no hidden costs surprise you during the closing process.

faqs.question: How do I ensure the real estate agent I choose in Sector 90 is trustworthy and RERA compliant
faqs.answer: A trustworthy agent will always be transparent about their RERA registration status. We only partner with RERA-registered professionals who uphold strict legal and ethical standards. You should request to see their RERA certificate and check for positive reviews specific to the Sector 90 area, ensuring they have a verifiable history of successful and compliant transactions.

faqs.question: What types of properties are most popular for investment in Sector 90 right now
faqs.answer: Sector 90 is highly popular for mid-to-high-segment residential apartments due to its proximity to the Dwarka Expressway and excellent infrastructure planning. Investment in builder floors and smaller residential plots also sees strong appreciation potential, particularly areas offering quick access to NH-48 and Manesar's industrial belt, driven by strong rental demand.

faqs.question: What are the current average property rates per square foot in Sector 90
faqs.answer: Property rates in Sector 90 are dynamic and vary significantly based on the specific micro-location, builder reputation, age of the property, and amenities offered. While generic figures exist, our agents provide a real-time Comparative Market Analysis (CMA) based on the latest closed deals in your specific society or block to give you the most accurate pricing data.

faqs.question: Can your agents assist with properties still under construction in Sector 90
faqs.answer: Yes absolutely. Our expertise includes handling primary market sales for projects under construction. Our agents meticulously track construction progress, verify developer credibility, ensure all necessary approvals are in place, and guide you through the payment plan structure to mitigate risks associated with delayed projects.

faqs.question: How long does the typical selling process take for a flat in Sector 90
faqs.answer: The duration of the selling process depends on market conditions and the competitiveness of the price. An accurately priced, well-presented property in a desirable Sector 90 society can sell within 45 to 90 days. Our agents expedite this by using professional photography, targeted marketing, and extensive buyer networks.

faqs.question: Are your real estate agents also experts in the rental market of Sector 90 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes, our network includes specialized rental agents. They possess thorough knowledge of the rental yields, demand areas, and standard lease terms for Sector 90 apartments and independent floors, ensuring landlords secure reliable tenants quickly and tenants find suitable homes efficiently.

faqs.question: What are the common hidden costs a buyer should be aware of when purchasing property here
faqs.answer: While we strive for transparency, buyers should budget for stamp duty and registration fees, society maintenance charges which can vary widely, and potential charges for utilities like electricity and water connections. Our agents provide a full cost breakdown early in the process so there are no surprises at closing.

faqs.question: How do real estate agents help with property valuation when selling a house
faqs.answer: Agents utilize sophisticated tools and access to private sales data to generate a detailed valuation report. This goes beyond online estimates by factoring in unique property features, recent sales benchmarks within Sector 90, and upcoming localized market influences, ensuring your asking price is both competitive and profitable.

faqs.question: What is the future growth prediction for Sector 90 real estate investments
faqs.answer: Sector 90 is positioned for continued strong growth, largely driven by the operationalization of the Dwarka Expressway and the development of surrounding commercial zones. Experts predict steady capital appreciation over the next five years, making it a robust area for long-term real estate investment in New Gurugram.
